source.name: Exercise 6
source.instructions: Repeat Exercise 4 in a new stored procedure, named spGetItemsMidPriceFlex, that accepts the minimum and maximum price limits as input parameters. Note from the definition of the item table that the price field is of the FLOAT data type. Pass the arguments to the stored procedure using the order of, first, the minimum price and, then, the maximum price.

sequence.output:
